name: A Vampire Tale
summary: Mystery Series – A Vampire Tale is a Hidden Object game for PC and Mac, which uses the proven Unity 3D engine and stunning concept art to introduce the player to a unique folkloric Vampire universe where they need to solve a series of quests surrounding a mysterious abduction. With a target audience of predominantly casual players “A vampire tale” comes to an already existing popular market of hidden object games. It is intended to be the first part of a series.
